info.name: IFS fern short (cumulated)
info.description:
Fern IFS golfing inspired from iq's [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/lst3zf[/url]
Cumulated version of [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/Xl2yWm[/url]

renderpass.code:
// Cumulated version of https://www.shadertoy.com/view/Xl2yWm

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) { O = texture( iChannel0, U /  iResolution.xy ) / float(iFrame); }
renderpass.name: Image
Buffer A
